messages.title: Vote Lib Dem get Tory...
messages.content: Lib Dem Leader Nick Clegg is refusing to rule out a back room deal to put the Tories into power. Many Lib Dem voters would be horrified to watch the Lib Dems hand power to the Tories. But up and down the country this is what has happened. The Lib Dems and Tories do back room deals to make sure they run many major councils.

issues.governance: Lib Dem Leader Nick Clegg is refusing to rule out a back room deal to put the Tories into power.

quotes.text: Nick Clegg will back Tories in hung Parliament
Clegg could support Tories in a minority government
Clegg: I would back Tories in hung poll

images.caption: LOCAL COUNCILS CONTROLLED BY TORY-LIB DEM DEALS

leaflet.additionalNotes: Lists local councils allegedly controlled by Tory-Lib Dem deals: Blackburn, Birmingham, Newcastle-under-Lyme, Newport, Leeds, Camden, London, Southwark, London, Carlisle, Dumfries and Galloway, Ipswich, Warrington, St. Helens.
